formulas.name: Servicedetailrequest1
formulas.expression: IF({!Phone_Number_Required}!=NULL, "Phone Number Required -" +{!Phone_Number_Required}+ {!Newline}, "") + IF({!Region_Requested}!=NULL, "Region Requested -" +{!Region_Requested}+ {!Newline}, "") + IF({!Area_Code_Requested}!=NULL, "Area Code Requested -" +{!Area_Code_Requested}+ {!Newline}, "")+ IF({!Teams_Phone_Access}!=NULL, "Team Phone Access - -" +{!Teams_Phone_Access}+ {!Newline}, "") + IF({!Teams_Phone_Access1}!=NULL, "Team Phone Access - -" +{!Teams_Phone_Access1}+ {!Newline}, "") + IF({!Teams_Phone_Access2}!=NULL, "Team Phone Access - -" +{!Teams_Phone_Access2}+ {!Newline}, "") + IF({!Employee_Type}="Billable" && {!Teams_Phone_Access1}="Yes" && {!Hiring_Manager.recordId}<>{!Get_Logged_In_User.Id}, {!Label} + {!Newline}, "") + {!Newline}

formulas.name: ServiceRequest
formulas.expression: "Hardware Information :- "+ {!Newline}+ IF({!Laptop_Type}!=NULL, "Bundle -" +{!Laptop_Type}+ {!Newline}, "") + IF({!Laptop_Type}="Bundle B1: One (1) developer laptop, two (2) monitors, one (1) keyboard/mouse combo, one (1) headset, and (1) dock, (1) DisplayPort to HDMI Adapter", {!Approval4}+ {!Newline}, "") + IF({!Laptop_Type}="Bundle B2: One (1) developer laptop, one (1) monitor, one (1) keyboard/mouse combo, and one (1) headset", {!Approval4}+ {!Newline}, "") + IF({!Laptop_Type}="Bundle B3: One (1) developer laptop, one (1) keyboard/mouse combo, one (1) headset", {!Approval4}+ {!Newline}, "") + IF({!Laptop_Type}="Bundle B4: One (1) developer laptop", {!Approval4}+ {!Newline}, "") + IF({!Laptop_Type}="Bundle B5: One (1) developer laptop, one(1) dock", {!Approval4}+ {!Newline}, "") + IF({!Laptop_Type1}="Developer", "" +{!approval1}+ {!Newline}, "") + IF({!Laptop_Type1}="Executive", "" +{!approval1}+ {!Newline}, "") + IF({!Laptop_Type1}="Mac", "" +{!approval1}+ {!Newline}, "") + IF({!Laptop_Type1}!=NULL, "Hardware Accessories" + {!Newline}, "") + If({!Docking_Station}==TRUE,"Docking Station" +{!Newline},null)+ If({!External_Monitor_Single}==TRUE,"External Monitor: Single" +{!Newline},null)+ If({!External_Monitor_Double}==TRUE,"External Monitor: Double" +{!Newline},null)+ If({!Headset_Wired}==TRUE,"Headset: Wired" +{!Newline},null)+ If({!Speaker}==TRUE,"System Speaker" +{!Newline},null)+ If({!Keyboard_Mouse_Combo_Wireless}==TRUE,"Keyboard/Mouse Combo: Wireless" +{!Newline},null)+ If({!Keyboard_Wireless}==TRUE,"Keyboard: Wireless" +{!Newline},null)+ If({!Mouse_Wireless}==TRUE,"Mouse: Wireless" +{!Newline},null)+ If({!Keyboard_Wired}==TRUE,"Keyboard: Wired" +{!Newline},null)+ If({!Mouse_Wired}==TRUE,"Mouse: Wired" +{!Newline},null)+ If({!External_Webcam_Wired}==TRUE,"External Webcam: Wired" +{!Newline},null)+ If({!Power_Adapter}==TRUE,"Power Adapter" +{!Newline},null)+ If({!Printer}==TRUE,"Printer" +{!Newline},null)+ If({!Other}==TRUE,"Other" +{!Newline},null)+ IF({!Additional_Information1}!=NULL, "Additional Information -" +{!Additional_Information1}+ {!Newline}, "") + IF({!Additional_Information}!=NULL, "Additional Information -" +{!Additional_Information}+ {!Newline}, "") + IF({!Shipping_Information}!=NULL, "Shipping Information -" +{!Shipping_Information}+ {!Newline}, "") + "ShippingAddress"+ {!Newline}+ IF({!Address_10}!=NULL, " Address 1 - " +{!Address_10}+ {!Newline}, "")+ IF({!Address_20}!=NULL, " Address 2 - " +{!Address_20}+ {!Newline}, "")+ IF({!City}!=NULL, "City -" +{!City}+ {!Newline}, "")+ IF({!State_Province}!=NULL, "State/Province -" +{!State_Province}+ {!Newline}, "")+ IF({!Zip_Postal_Code}!=NULL, "Zip/Postal Code -" +{!Zip_Postal_Code}+ {!Newline}, "")+ IF({!Country}!=NULL, "Country -" +{!Country}+ {!Newline}, "")+ IF({!Email_Address.value}!=NULL, "Email Address -" +{!Email_Address.value}+ {!Newline}, "") + IF({!CountryCode5.value}!=NULL, "Country Code -" +{!CountryCode5.value}+ {!Newline}, "") +IF({!CountryCode6.value}!=NULL, "Country Code -" +{!CountryCode6.value}+ {!Newline}, "") + IF({!CountryCode7.value}!=NULL, "Country Code -" +{!CountryCode7.value}+ {!Newline}, "") + IF({!CountryCode8.value}!=NULL, "Country Code -" +{!CountryCode8.value}+ {!Newline}, "") + IF({!Cell_Number.value}!=NULL, "Cell Number -" +{!Cell_Number.value}+ {!Newline}, "")+ {!Newline}

formulas.name: Servicerequest2
formulas.expression: "Application/Software Information :- "+ {!Newline}+ If({!Bullhorn_HR}==TRUE,"Bullhorn HR" +{!Newline},null)+ IF({!Bullhorn_Role}!=NULL, "Bullhorn Role -" +{!Bullhorn_Role}+ {!Newline}, "") + IF({!Additional_Bullhorn_Details}!=NULL, "Additional Bullhorn Details -" +{!Additional_Bullhorn_Details}+ {!Newline}, "") + If({!Visio}==TRUE,"Visio" +{!Newline},null)+ If({!Visio}==TRUE,{!Display3} +{!Newline},null)+ If({!Zoom}==TRUE,"Zoom" +{!Newline},null)+ If({!WebEx}==TRUE,"WebEx" +{!Newline},null)+ If({!Skype}==TRUE,"Skype" +{!Newline},null)+ If({!Nitro_PDF}==TRUE,"Nitro PDF" +{!Newline},null)+ If({!Nitro_PDF}==TRUE,{!Display1}+{!Newline},null)+ If({!Power_BI_Free}==TRUE,"Power BI Free" +{!Newline},null)+ If({!Power_BI_Pro}==TRUE,"Power BI Pro" +{!Newline},null)+ If({!Power_BI_Pro}==TRUE,{!Display2} +{!Newline},null)+ If({!Cloud_Call_Communicator}==TRUE,"Cloud Call Communicator" +{!Newline},null)+ IF({!Region_Requested1}!=NULL, "Region Requested -" +{!Region_Requested1}+ {!Newline}, "") + IF({!Area_Code_Requested1}!=NULL, "Area Code Requested -" +{!Area_Code_Requested1}+ {!Newline}, "") + If({!DocuSign}==TRUE,"DocuSign" +{!Newline},null)+ If({!CareerBuilder}==TRUE,"CareerBuilder" +{!Newline},null)+ If({!Oracle_HCM}==TRUE,"Oracle HCM" +{!Newline},null)+ If({!Oracle_ERP}==TRUE,"Oracle ERP" +{!Newline},null)+ If({!Salesforce}==TRUE,"Salesforce" +{!Newline},null)+ If({!QuickBooks}==TRUE,"QuickBooks" +{!Newline},null)+ If({!ZoomInfo}==TRUE,"ZoomInfo" +{!Newline},null)+ If({!Monster}==TRUE,"Monster" +{!Newline},null)+ If({!Ascent_DICE}==TRUE,"Ascent DICE" +{!Newline},null)+ If({!Daxtra}==TRUE,"Daxtra" +{!Newline},null)+ If({!Broadbean}==TRUE,"Broadbean" +{!Newline},null)+ If({!LinkedIn_Recruiter}==TRUE,"LinkedIn Recruiter" +{!Newline},null)+ If({!LinkedIn_Recruiter}==TRUE,"LinkedIn Recruiter" +{!Newline},null)+ If({!ACS_DICE}==TRUE,"ACS DICE" +{!Newline},null)+ If({!Sales_Navigator}==TRUE,"Sales Navigator" +{!Newline},null)+ If({!Egencia}==TRUE,"Egencia" +{!Newline},null)+ If({!Concur}==TRUE,"Concur" +{!Newline},null)+ If({!LMS}==TRUE,"LMS" +{!Newline},null)

formulas.name: ServiceRequestdetails
formulas.expression: "User Information :- "+ {!Newline}+ IF({!Region}!=NULL, "Region -" +{!Region}+ {!Newline}, "") + IF({!Brand}!=NULL, "Brand -" +{!Brand}+ {!Newline}, "") + IF({!Department}!=NULL, "Department -" +{!Department}+ {!Newline}, "") + IF({!Department12}!=NULL, "Department -" +{!Department12}+ {!Newline}, "") + IF({!Department13}!=NULL, "Department -" +{!Department13}+ {!Newline}, "") + IF({!Employee_Type}!=NULL, "Employee Type -" +{!Employee_Type} + {!Newline}, "") + IF({!First_Name}!=NULL, "First Name -" +{!First_Name}+ {!Newline}, "") + IF({!Middle_Name}!=NULL, "Middle Name -" +{!Middle_Name}+ {!Newline}, "") + IF({!Last_Name}!=NULL, "Last Name -" +{!Last_Name}+ {!Newline}, "") + IF({!Preferred_Name}!=NULL, "Preferred Name -" +{!Preferred_Name}+ {!Newline}, "") + IF(TEXT({!Start_Date})!=NULL, "Start Date -" +TEXT({!Start_Date})+ {!Newline}, "") + IF({!Job_Title}!=NULL, "Job Title -" +{!Job_Title}+ {!Newline}, "") + IF({!CountryCode1.value}!=NULL, "Country Code -" +{!CountryCode1.value}+ {!Newline}, "") + IF({!CountryCode2.value}!=NULL, "Country Code -" +{!CountryCode2.value}+ {!Newline}, "") + IF({!CountryCode3.value}!=NULL, "Country Code -" +{!CountryCode3.value}+ {!Newline}, "") + IF({!CountryCode4.value}!=NULL, "Country Code -" +{!CountryCode4.value}+ {!Newline}, "") + IF({!Personal_Phone_Number.value}!=NULL, "Personal Phone Number -" +{!Personal_Phone_Number.value}+ {!Newline}, "") + IF({!Personal_Email_Address.value}!=NULL, "Personal Email Address -" +{!Personal_Email_Address.value}+ {!Newline}, "") + "HomeAddress"+ {!Newline}+ IF({!Address_01}!=NULL, "Address 1 -" +{!Address_01}+ {!Newline}, "")+ IF({!Address_02}!=NULL, "Address 2 -" +{!Address_02}+ {!Newline}, "")+ IF({!City}!=NULL, "City -" +{!City1}+ {!Newline}, "")+ IF({!State_Province1}!=NULL, "State/Province -" +{!State_Province1}+ {!Newline}, "")+ IF({!Zip_Postal_Code1}!=NULL, "Zip/Postal Code -" +{!Zip_Postal_Code1}+ {!Newline}, "")+ IF({!Country1}!=NULL, "Country -" +{!Country1}+ {!Newline}, "")+ IF({!Hiring_Manager.recordName}!=NULL, "Hiring manager -" +{!Hiring_Manager.recordName}+ {!Newline}, "") + IF({!Model_After_User.recordName}!=NULL, "Model After User -" +{!Model_After_User.recordName}+ {!Newline}, "") + IF({!Email_Domain_Requested}!=NULL, "Email Domain Requested -" +{!Email_Domain_Requested}+ {!Newline}, "") + IF({!Office_License_Type}!=NULL, "Microsoft Office License Type -" +{!Office_License_Type}+ {!Newline}, "") + IF({!Office_License_Type1}!=NULL, "Microsoft Office License Type -" +{!Office_License_Type1}+ {!Newline}, "") + IF({!Employee_Type}="Billable" && {!Office_License_Type}="Full Desktop Access" && {!Hiring_Manager.recordId}<>{!Get_Logged_In_User.Id}, {!Label} + {!Newline}, "")

fields.name: approval1
fields.fieldText:
Approvals Required-

This option is for software developers only and will require IT Approval.

fields.name: Approval2
fields.fieldText:
Approvals Required

This option is for VPs and above and will require IT Approval.

fields.name: Approval3
fields.fieldText:
Approvals Required

This option will require Direct Manager Approval, IT Approval, and CIO Approval.

fields.name: Approval4
fields.fieldText:
Approvals Required

This option is for software developers only and will require IT Approval.
